Plot.
After a dying Voodoo queen chooses an adopted apprentice as her successor
her true heir is outraged. Seeking revenge, he buys the bones of Blacula
the vampire off of a dealer, and uses voodoo to bring the vampire back to
do his bidding. In turn, Blacula turns him into a vampire and makes him
his slave. Meanwhile, a police officer with a large collection of African
antiques and an interest in the occult investigates the murders caused by
Blacula and his vampire horde.
